message.body: What time/ where is your gig again Friday?
8 at hotel Fiesole in skippack. 4046 skippack pike
Gonna be able to make it?
Not sure still depends on when Agata will be getting into philly. I'll probably have to rent a car too so I'll have to see how timing works
You headlining? Or only act?
Only. We're on all night.
I don't think we'll be doing any gigs with other bands any more. The last one didn't work out well.
Yup. 4 hrs. Normal gig.
We're doing a new song. Da butt.
Haha OK. I will let u know what we end up doing. Hopefully we can make it out
How early could you get here on the train?
I don't know when Agata will be here. It depends when she gets off work and what train she catches from NYC
Sometimes she doesn't get in until 11pm but she thinks she's getting off early Friday
Hotel Fiesole looks nice. How much are tickets? I'm trying to get Ed to come so he can drive us
It is nice. And it's free. It's a bar.
Cool I think we will be able to stop by
Dad is the show 21+?
Yup
Problem?
They Kicked mom and Devon out the night of our 25th anniversary because Devon was too young.
THey let them stay for half an hour though because of the circumstances.
Agata only 20
Oh that was same venue?
They don't card as far as I know. I think she should be able to get in. Devon was in for a whole night one time previously.
I'm pretty sure she could pass for 21. It's a hotel so it's not really like a bar. Although there is a bar there.
OK well we'll give it shot then
There's nobody at the door. Like a bouncer or whatever. You just walked in the go down the steps. There shouldn't be any problem.
Even better if you get there a little early and come in with the band.
I don't think I'll be there early. Ed gets home from work round 630
But we will be there
Ok
Ask mom if she has my keys
Never mind
If you can't find parking in the lot try across the street or there is a lot up in the back. You have to go through the covered bridge there's a big sign that
says additional parking.
OK sounds good. Were probably not going to be there until around 9 or so. Making dinner now
K
On your way?
Yep
